snippet.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 - Nintendo DS trailer
snippet.description:
In this new trailer for Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows™ - Part 2 the videogame, Hogwarts is on fire, the shield is broken and full scale battle is the order of day.  Based on the upcoming Warner Bros. Pictures film and featuring the most epic battles to date, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows™ - Part 2 the videogame promises an unforgettable interactive finale.

As the battle rages, all eight playable characters are seen defending Hogwarts and its numerous enemies as the showdown between Harry and Voldemort draws near. Enemies are introduced and you will finally get a glimpse of who you must defeat as you fight in the battle to end all battles.

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows™ - Part 2 the videogame, licensed by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, will be available for Xbox 360®, PlayStation®3, Wii™, Nintendo DS and PC in July 2011.
